name: thrombosis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a medical condition in which the flow of blood in the body is blocked by a clot (= partly solid mass) of blood: Maintaining whatever mobility is possible can prevent thrombosis. Travellers risk deep vein thromboses if they sit in cramped seats for too long. Related words
thrombose
thrombosed
More examplesFewer examplesA blood test is performed in the laboratory to diagnose thrombosis.He gave the cause of death as coronary thrombosis. Arterial and venous thromboses can occur in a number of organs.
